INTERSHOP IOM 4.2.0-SNAPSHOT Database Model   (revision 2bd82b01373462d2e16e3d1f39d6e6972426a586)

Table omt.FeatureToggleDTO

A list of feature-toggles to globally enable or disable features in the OMT.

Columns 

References[1] Column Type Constraints[2] Default Comment
id integer PK, UNIQUE, NOT_NULL  
key varchar UNIQUE, NOT_NULL The key of the toggle, which can be used to find the feature-toggle. Do not change it! 
description text  
active boolean NOT_NULL false Whether the feature is active. 

[1] Not all references are enforced by a foreign key where they could.
Such "missing" foreign keys are denoted with [[ ]].

[2] Constraints:
PK : the column is part of the primary key
UNIQUE: does don't cover unique constraints and indexes defined on more than one column.

Constraints and Indexes 

Type Name Definition
PRIMARY KEY FeatureToggleDTO_pkey PRIMARY KEY (id) 
UNIQUE CONSTRAINT FeatureToggleDTO_uk4fkcheck UNIQUE (key)
